Should we just do something like this?

pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*##a[href^="https://slotspilot.com/"]
/\/uploads\/2025/\d{2}\/[0-9a-z]{6,12}\.jpg$/$image,match-case,~third-party,domain=igg-games.*|pcgamestorrents.*
||igg-games.*/wp-content/uploads/*/hh1.gif
igg-games.*##a[href^="http://s.igg-games.com/index.php?qc="]
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[target="_blank"] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[aria-label] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[href] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*##article * > a[href]:has([width="669"][height="85"])

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.outbrain.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.outbrain.com%2F) ### Comment > Zabawna sprawa. Bo zazwyczaj blokuje się Outbraina, ale ja muszę się tam logować ze względów zawodowych. ALe mimo tego, że dodaje reguły niestandardowe `(@@||www.outbrain.com^$important` > `@@||outbrain.com^$important` > `@@||my.outbrain.com^$important)` to nie jestem w stanie się tam zalogować i zawsze dostaje komunikat przeglądarki ERR_ADDRESS_INVALID. Jakiś pomysł co mam dodać w regułach, żeby Adguard pozwlił mi się tam dostac. ``` Username: @BRLosiu ``` ### Screenshots

ALe mimo tego, że dodaje reguły niestandardowe `(@@||www.outbrain.com^$important` > `@@||outbrain.com^$important` > `@@||my.outbrain.com^$important)` to nie jestem w stanie się tam zalogować i zawsze dostaje komunikat przeglądarki ERR_ADDRESS_INVALID. issue.title: Fix #211622 igg-games/pcgamestorrents

comment.body:
Should we just do something like this?

pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*##a[href^="https://slotspilot.com/"]
/\/uploads\/2025/\d{2}\/[0-9a-z]{6,12}\.jpg$/$image,match-case,~third-party,domain=igg-games.*|pcgamestorrents.*
||igg-games.*/wp-content/uploads/*/hh1.gif
igg-games.*##a[href^="http://s.igg-games.com/index.php?qc="]
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[target="_blank"] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[aria-label] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[href] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*##article * > a[href]:has([width="669"][height="85"])

issue.title: Fix #211622 igg-games/pcgamestorrents

comment.body:
Should we just do something like this?

pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*##a[href^="https://slotspilot.com/"]
/\/uploads\/2025/\d{2}\/[0-9a-z]{6,12}\.jpg$/$image,match-case,~third-party,domain=igg-games.*|pcgamestorrents.*
||igg-games.*/wp-content/uploads/*/hh1.gif
igg-games.*##a[href^="http://s.igg-games.com/index.php?qc="]
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[target="_blank"] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[aria-label] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*###tm-sidebar div > a[href] > img
pcgamestorrents.*,igg-games.*##article * > a[href]:has([width="669"][height="85"])
